message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE

The paper deals with the problem of learning word-referent mappings from raw inputs such as images and words, which involves natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) techniques. Therefore, cs.CL and cs.CV are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also presents a neural network model that is trained from scratch via self-supervision, which involves machine learning (ML) techniques such as deep learning and reinforcement learning. Therefore, cs.LG and cs.AI are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with the problem of generalization to novel instances of a known word, which involves the study of neural networks that can learn and adapt to new data, which is a topic of interest in the sub-category cs.NE.
